content: The title compound was prepared by the reaction of 1-ethylimidazole (1.44 g, 15 mmol) with CuCl2 · 2H2O (0.85 g, 5 mmol) and potassium thiocyanate (0.98 g, 10 mmol) by means of hydrothermal synthesis in a Teflon lined stainless-steel reactor at 383 K for 24 h. Single crystals suitable for X-ray measurements were obtained by recrystallization from methanol at room temperature.
clean_text:
Experimental

Synthesis

The title compound was prepared by the reaction of 1-ethylimidazole (1.44 g, 15 mmol) with CuCl2 ⋅ 2H2O (0.85 g, 5 mmol) and potassium thiocyanate (0.98 g, 10 mmol) by means of hydrothermal synthesis in a Teflon lined stainless-steel reactor at 383 K for 24 h. Single crystals suitable for X-ray measurements were obtained by recrystallization from methanol at room temperature.
